com.ae.apps.lib.contacts.impl

Class ContactManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ae.apps.lib.contacts.impl.AbstractContactManager
      • com.ae.apps.lib.contacts.impl.ContactManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AeContactManager

    public class ContactManager
extends AbstractContactManager
    The ContactManager abstracts access to the Android's Contacts API and provide public methods to retrieve data. Users of ContactManager do not need to know the internals of Android's ContactsAPI or database calls.

    Needs the following permissions added to the manifest

            android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
        android.permission.CALL_PHONE
        android.permission.READ_SMS
